Sentencas: The Ni/YSZ composite anode has been widely explored for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Preparation and electrochemical performance of silver impregnated Ni-YSZ anode for solid oxide fuel cell in dry methane

Sentencas: However, it is susceptible to carbon coking in hydrocarbons because of the high catalytic activity of Ni for carbon formation.
Titulo: Preparation and electrochemical performance of silver impregnated Ni-YSZ anode for solid oxide fuel cell in dry methane

Sentencas: In this paper, Ag particles were incorporated into Nil YSZ anode to suppress the carbon deposition in hydrocarbons.
Titulo: Preparation and electrochemical performance of silver impregnated Ni-YSZ anode for solid oxide fuel cell in dry methane

Sentencas: The results showed that the performance of the modified cells was greatly increased as compared to the unmodified ones.
Titulo: Preparation and electrochemical performance of silver impregnated Ni-YSZ anode for solid oxide fuel cell in dry methane

Sentencas: The long term stability experiment was conducted for 100 h at 0.30 A/cm(2) in dry CH4 at 1023 K indicating the anti-coking ability of the anode was greatly improved.
Titulo: Preparation and electrochemical performance of silver impregnated Ni-YSZ anode for solid oxide fuel cell in dry methane

Sentencas: The particle size and morphology of silver particles are the essential factors influencing the cell performance such as the maximum power density and long-term stability.
Titulo: Preparation and electrochemical performance of silver impregnated Ni-YSZ anode for solid oxide fuel cell in dry methane

Sentencas: Therefore, silver can be suggested as a promising candidate material for modifying the Ni/YSZ anode with regard to improving electrochemical performance and suppressing the carbon deposition.
Titulo: Preparation and electrochemical performance of silver impregnated Ni-YSZ anode for solid oxide fuel cell in dry methane
